com.drgarbage.bytecode

Class ExceptionTableEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.drgarbage.bytecode.ExceptionTableEntry

  • public class ExceptionTableEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes an exception table entry in a Code attribute structure.
    Version:
    $Revision: 187 $ $Id: ExceptionTableEntry.java 187 2013-06-03 05:47:37Z salekseev $
    Author:
    Sergej Alekseev and Peter Palaga
